Home » 15A1 Ekakanipātapāḷi » 18 Aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagga
18.102--111
Aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagga
483--492.
455Paṭhamajjhānasahagataṃ saddhindriyaṃ bhāveti…  vīriyindriyaṃ bhāveti…  satindriyaṃ bhāveti…  samādhindriyaṃ bhāveti…  paññindriyaṃ bhāveti…  saddhābalaṃ bhāveti…  vīriyabalaṃ bhāveti…  satibalaṃ bhāveti…  samādhibalaṃ bhāveti…  paññābalaṃ bhāveti… .
<< 18.92--101 up18.112--181 >>
